english.segment1: I messed up my little world. Broke Your heart and about lost my mind. So far from You and so far gone. But Your love was there for me to find
english.segment2: O You just took ahold of me. And my tears were flowing freely. But Your joy came in the morning. And You blessed me. O You blessed me. You could have shunned me. But You blessed me
english.segment3: Now when I'm running out of rope. With less of me there's more of You. I worship You my only hope. 'Cause You're dear to me and I belog to You
english.segment4: O You just took ahold of me. And now I'm living freely. 'Cause You're joy comes in the morning. And You bless me. You bless me. You bless me
english.segment5: Your goodness led me to repentance. I fell down on my knees. Instead of judgement You gave me mercy. Now I am living in Your presence. Your love just flows so free. And Lord You take good care of me
english.segment6: And You bless me. You bless me. You bless me. O You bless me
